document_data.name: Eskornamundyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Eskornamundyr''' was the [[dragon]] emperor of the realm of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], in the world of [[Abeir]], centuries before the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.History: Eskornamundyr was killed by rebel forces led by the legendary hero [[Aunglass Roaryl]] centuries before the Spellplague happened. After his death, Eskorn became a human-dominated realm.
document_data.Legacy: The realm of Eskorn was named after him.
